WorkItem.Description: When importing a mage from bnet, the result is rawr shows survivability bars (green) instead of DPS (blue).
WorkItem.Summary: Mage model - bnet character import shows survivability, not dps

Comments.Message: I managed to get around this by resetting my talents  to the Fire preset and re-editing them.

Indeed, I built my mage from scratch in rawr, and it was DPS scores up until I selected Rune of Power as my level 90 talent, at which point everything changed to Survivability.

The two other lvl90 talents keep scores as DPS.

Continuing on, I selected the raid buffs for my mage, and when I got to Armor, the scores switched back to survivability when I selected one (molten), so I simply left it blank.

I now have a profile with DPS, but an inaccurate one.
